elements.name: Verifying all link under admin section

steps.name: I am already on the home page
I mouse hover to admin section
I mouse hover on the job section
I mouse hover on the job Titles link and click on it
I am directed to Job Titles page
I mouse hover on the job section again
I mouse hover on the Pay Grades link and click on it

I enter username as "admin" and password as "admin123"
I click on the login button
I validate that I am logged in to user home page as user
I verify the title of the Homepage
